title: Poking a Dead Frog: Conversations with Today&rsquo;s Top Comedy
description:
Amy Poehler, Mel Brooks, Adam McKay, George Saunders, Bill Hader, Patton Oswalt, and many more take us deep inside the mysterious world of comedy in this fascinating, laugh-out-loud-funny book. Packed with behind-the-scenes storiesÃ¢â‚¬â€from a day in the writersÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ room at The Onion to why a sketch does or doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t make it onto Saturday Night Live to how the BBC nearly erased the entire first season of Monty PythonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Flying CircusÃ¢â‚¬â€Poking a Dead Frog is a must-read for comedy buffs, writers and pop culture junkies alike.
